24namespace vsip
25{
26namespace impl
27{
28
29/// Traits class to determine if a map is serial or not.
30
31template <typename MapT>
32struct Is_local_map
33{ static bool const value = false; };
34
35template <typename Map>
36struct Is_global_map
37{ static bool const value = false; };
38
39template <typename MapT>
40struct Is_local_only
41{ static bool const value = Is_local_map<MapT>::value &&
42                           !Is_global_map<MapT>::value; };
43
44template <typename MapT>
45struct Is_global_only
46{ static bool const value = Is_global_map<MapT>::value &&
47                           !Is_local_map<MapT>::value; };
48
49template <dimension_type Dim,
50	  typename       MapT>
51struct Is_block_dist
52{ static bool const value = false; };
53
54
55} // namespace vsip::impl
56} // namespace vsip
57
58#endif // VSIP_CORE_MAP_TRAITS_HPP
